item.title: 沃什回归重燃美联储6.6万亿美元量化宽松后遗症争议
item.description: 在唐纳德·特朗普总统考虑下一任美联储主席人选的大部分时间里，市场争论的焦点始终围绕着他的选择是否会像他所期望的那样大幅降息。【原文：For much of the time that President Donald Trump was mulling his potential choice for the next chair of the Federal Reserve, the debate in markets swirled around whether his pick would lower interest rates as aggressively as he preferred.】

item.title: 首尔房价每周攀升，粉碎购房梦想
item.description:
首尔房地产市场的上涨令年轻上班族感到沮丧，他们眼睁睁看着房产阶梯的最低层渐行渐远。【原文：

Seoul's real estate rally is frustrating young workers who see the bottom rung of the property ladder float out of reach 

】

item.title: 英国反对党财政发言人抨击特朗普的贸易战
item.description: 英国反对党财政发言人计划在周一的演讲中表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普发起的贸易战"无疑是倒退之举，将使所有人境况恶化"。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war is “unquestionably a step backwards and will leave everyone worse off,” the UK opposition’s finance spokesman plans to say in a speech on Monday.】

item.title: 贝莱德、太平洋投资管理公司察觉通胀风险，而更广泛的市场对此视而不见
item.description: 贝莱德、桥水基金和太平洋投资管理公司的资金管理人正加紧调整投资组合，以应对新一轮通胀冲击。【原文：Money managers at BlackRock Inc., Bridgewater Associates and Pacific Investment Management Co. are shoring up their portfolios against a fresh bout of inflation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚或逆全球趋势转向加息
item.description: 澳大利亚央行面临一个令人不适的前景：本周可能逆全球趋势而行，重启加息以抑制卷土重来的通胀——而距离上次降息还不到六个月。【原文：Australia’s central bank faces the uncomfortable prospect of going against the global grain and switching back to raising interest rates this week to douse resurgent inflation — less than six months after it last cut.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚持暂停增产，尽管伊朗因素推高油价
item.description: 欧佩克+联盟批准了维持三月产量不变的计划——这是为期三个月的供应冻结期的最后阶段，即便油价因美国可能对伊朗发动打击的前景而触及四个月高点。【原文：OPEC+ ratified plans to keep production steady in March — the last part of a three-month supply freeze, even after prices hit a four-month high on the prospect of a US strike against Iran.】

item.title: 股市波动退居次席，大宗商品与外汇市场波动更受关注
item.description: 今年迄今为止，股票市场的波动性远低于其他几乎所有市场，贵金属、外汇和商品市场则经历了更为剧烈的震荡。【原文：Equities have been far less volatile than almost everything else so far this year, with bigger swings racing through the markets for precious metals, currencies and commodities.】

item.title: 据称，新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）和穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala）即将加入KKR，共同参与100亿美元的STT交易。
item.description: 知情人士透露，新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）与穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.）正就加入KKR公司及新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）的潜在收购计划进行磋商，拟共同收购数据中心运营商STT GDC Pte。此交易或将成为近月来规模最大的数字基础设施并购案之一。【原文：GIC Pte and Mubadala Investment Co. are in talks to join KKR & Co. and Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. in their potential purchase of data center operator STT GDC Pte, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the biggest digital infrastructure deals in recent months.】

item.title: 比亚迪1月汽车销量暴跌30%，中国市场需求降温
item.description: 比亚迪公司表示，1月份销量下滑30%，凸显出这家电动汽车制造商在扩大销量的努力中面临的挑战，恰逢补贴政策收紧导致中国市场需求疲软。【原文：BYD Co. said sales dropped 30% in January, underscoring the challenges facing the electric vehicle maker’s efforts to boost sales just as a winding back of subsidies hurts demand in China.】

item.title: 微软3810亿美元惨败暴露出人工智能狂欢的阴暗面
item.description: 华尔街对开发人工智能技术成本的担忧已在股市表面之下酝酿数月之久。如今，这种担忧正开始沸腾。【原文：Wall Street’s apprehension about the cost of developing artificial intelligence technology has been simmering beneath the surface of the stock market for months. Now it’s starting to boil over.】

item.title: 债券买家遍寻拉丁美洲，押注与特朗普关系密切的国家
item.description: 从T. Rowe Price集团到TCW集团的投资者们正拥抱一种在新兴市场迅速成为常态的策略：向与特朗普总统立场一致的拉丁美洲国家注入资金。【原文：Investors from T. Rowe Price Group Inc. to TCW Group Inc. are embracing a strategy that’s rapidly becoming the norm in emerging markets: pour money into Latin American countries aligned with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价涨幅加速，即便加息迫在眉睫
item.description: 澳大利亚1月份房价涨幅加速，凸显出储备银行决策者面临的挑战——在房地产市场购房负担能力已然吃紧之际，他们正权衡是否加息。【原文：Australia’s home-price growth gathered pace in January, underscoring the challenge for Reserve Bank policymakers as they weigh interest-rate increases in a property market already grappling with stretched affordability.】

item.title: 苹果创纪录财季并未改变对人工智能审视的需求
item.description: 苹果假日季度的惊人业绩固然亮眼——但这不应成为逃避人工智能审判的借口。此外：新款MacBook Pro计划随macOS 26.3版本周期发布；该公司正探索为即将推出的折叠屏手机开发翻盖式后续机型；更新版AirTag终于面世。【原文：Apple’s blockbuster holiday quarter was impressive — but it shouldn’t give cover to avoid an AI reckoning. Also: A new MacBook Pro is planned for the macOS 26.3 release cycle; the company explores a clamshell follow-up to its upcoming foldable phone; and an updated AirTag finally rolls out.】

item.title: 《每日电讯报》称劳斯莱斯月球核反应堆计划受阻
item.description: 据《每日电讯报》报道，英国发动机制造商罗尔斯罗伊斯控股公司已叫停一项由政府数百万资金支持的计划，该计划旨在将微型核反应堆送上月球。【原文：British engine maker Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc has halted a plan backed by millions in government funding to put a mini nuclear reactor on the Moon, the Telegraph reported.】

item.title: 沙特增产石油推动经济增速创2022年以来新高
item.description: 2025年，沙特阿拉伯经济增速创下三年新高，在欧佩克+新供应政策下，石油行业正成为更强劲的增长引擎。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s economy expanded at the fastest pace in three years in 2025, with the oil sector emerging as a stronger engine of growth under new OPEC+ supply policy.】

item.title: OPEC+代表称，该组织有望批准3月暂停增产计划
item.description: 石油输出国组织及其盟友（OPEC+）代表在周日在线会议前表示，该组织有望批准暂停3月增产的计划。【原文：OPEC+ is on track to ratify its plans to pause production increases in March, delegates said ahead of the group’s online meeting on Sunday.】

item.title: NCC称正就出售工业部门与CRH-海德堡集团进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，北欧建筑公司NCC AB正就出售其工业业务进行深入谈判，买家方为包括CRH Plc和海德堡建材集团在内的财团，这两家公司均属全球最大的建材企业。【原文：Nordic construction firm NCC AB is in advanced talks to sell its industry business to a consortium including CRH Plc and Heidelberg Materials AG, two of the world’s biggest building materials companies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丹纳塔拉将在股市暴跌后继续投资印尼股票
item.description: 印尼丹纳塔拉公司已指示其委托的资产管理公司本周继续买入本土股票，这是政府为提振陷入困境的资本市场信心所采取的最新举措。【原文：Indonesia’s Danantara has instructed asset managers it places funds with to continue buying local stocks this week, the latest step by the government to restore confidence in its beleaguered capital markets.】

item.title: 印度削减税收以促进稀土加工业发展，以应对中国
item.description: 印度正计划取消对关键矿物加工设备进口的关税，并推动本土稀土磁铁制造，此举旨在最大限度减少对中国的依赖。【原文：India is looking to remove taxes on import of equipment for processing critical minerals and spur manufacturing of rare earth magnets locally, a move aimed at minimizing dependence on China.】

item.title: 尼日利亚首家控股公司注销坏账后瞄准增长
item.description: 尼日利亚最大贷款机构之一First HoldCo Plc在清理贷款账簿并强化资产负债表后，预测今年利润将实现增长。【原文：First HoldCo Plc, one of Nigeria’s biggest lenders, forecast profit growth this year after cleaning up its loan book and strengthening the balance sheet.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋称对OpenAI的投资"从未构成承诺"
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋表示，该公司拟向OpenAI投资1000亿美元的计划“从未构成承诺”，并将对任何融资轮次采取“逐轮审议”的态度。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said the company’s proposed $100 billion investment in OpenAI was “never a commitment” and that the company would consider any funding rounds “one at a time.”】

item.title: 印度提出新激励措施以提振市政债券市场
item.description: 印度政府提出新举措以提振该国市政债券市场，并鼓励市政机构发行更高价值的债务。随着城市基础设施需求不断增长，联邦政府预算面临压力。【原文：The Indian government proposed fresh steps to boost the nation’s municipal bond market and encourage civic bodies to issue higher value debt as rising urban infrastructure needs weigh on the federal government’s budget.】

item.title: 凯捷将剥离美国子公司，该子公司因与美国移民海关执法局签订合同而受到批评
item.description: 法国IT服务提供商凯捷公司计划出售其在美国的一家子公司，该子公司因与美国移民与海关执法局（ICE）签订的合同正面临审查。【原文：French IT services provider Capgemini SE plans to sell a US-based unit that’s facing scrutiny over its contracts with US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).】

item.title: 亲北京报纸猛烈抨击巴拿马对和记黄埔的裁决
item.description: 一家亲北京的报纸猛烈抨击巴拿马最高法院撤销和记黄埔有限公司运营两座港口的合同的决定，指责该裁决屈从于美国压力，并敦促香港企业停止在该地区的投资。【原文：A pro-Beijing newspaper has slammed a decision by Panama’s top court to void CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s contract to operate two ports, accusing the ruling of kowtowing to US pressure and urging Hong Kong businesses to halt investment in the region.】

item.title: 印度寻求海外侨民资本，因外国资金撤离本土股市
item.description: 印度正试图吸引更多海外侨民资金流入本土股市，因全球资金正因企业盈利担忧及他处更具吸引力的回报而撤离。【原文：India is seeking to draw more money from its overseas nationals into local equities as global funds pull back amid concerns over corporate earnings and more attractive returns elsewhere.】

item.title: 印度军费开支将增加18%，巴基斯坦紧张局势持续
item.description: 印度计划在即将到来的财政年度将新型军事装备的支出提高近18%，以增强其军事能力，因该国与巴基斯坦的紧张局势持续存在。【原文：India plans to raise spending on new military hardware by nearly 18% in the coming financial year, strengthening its capabilities as tensions with Pakistan persist.】

item.title: 受地缘政治因素影响，沙特股市创六月以来最大跌幅，金价回落
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯股市周日创下近八个月最大跌幅，全球金属抛售潮冲击当地矿业股，同时关于美国、伊朗和以色列可能卷入军事冲突的猜测持续升温。【原文：Saudi Arabian equities dropped the most in almost eight months on Sunday as a global metals selloff hit local miners and speculation intensified over the possibility of military attacks involving the US, Iran and Israel.】

item.title: 印度将核设备进口关税豁免期延长至2035年
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔玛拉·西塔拉曼在周日的预算演讲中表示，印度将继续对核电设备进口提供现行免税政策，直至2035年，且不受项目规模限制。【原文：India will continue to offer the existing tax waivers for imports of nuclear power equipment until 2035, regardless of the size of the projects, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said in her budget speech on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度推出20年税收优惠政策以吸引全球数据中心
item.description: 印度将为在该国提供全球数据中心服务的海外企业提供长达二十年的免税期，以加大吸引投资者力度，推动其快速发展的数字基础设施领域。【原文：India will offer a two-decade tax holiday to overseas firms that provide global data center services from the country, stepping up efforts to woo investors in its fast-growing digital infrastructure sector.】

item.title: 印度将把金融中心免税期延长一倍以促进商业发展
item.description: 印度预算文件显示，该国将延长其国际金融中心的免税期，以提升该地对外国企业的吸引力。【原文：India will extend a tax-holiday at its international finance hub to boost the appeal for foreign businesses setting up shop there, according to the country’s budget documents.】
